title: Kate Green – 2021 Comments on Children Missing School
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Kate Green, the Shadow Secretary of State for Education, on 20 July 2021.
content:
The Conservatives have abandoned the nation’s children with no action taken to turn the tide on rising cases in schools.
